subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Of the 156 players who started the United States Open, only Phil Mickelson and Billy Horschel were under par by nightfall, tying for first overall on the leader board.
snippet: Of the 156 players who started the United States Open, only Phil Mickelson and Billy Horschel were under par by nightfall, tying for first overall on the leader board.
